name: Polyswipe
description: Polyswipe is a mobile-first platform that makes prediction markets simple, fast, and accessible to everyone. Integrated with Polymarket, users can trade conviction by swiping right for belief or left for doubtâ€”no terminals, no friction. Live on iOS, Android, Web, and the Solana Dapp Store, Polyswipe delivers a clean, intuitive experience with powerful features like event filtering, bookmarking, and personalized market discovery. Built for both crypto-natives and everyday users, Polyswipe transforms prediction markets into an engaging consumer product that fits right in your pocket.
